channel.title: Comments on: Just Say No
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: I do miss you guys very much. Sometimes I forget where I am and think that I will run into you or Bob at the grocery store.
item.content:encoded: I do miss you guys very much. Sometimes I forget where I am and think that I will run into you or Bob at the grocery store.

item.title: By: Mandy
item.dc:creator: Mandy
item.description: I thought maybe you'd have an entry dedicated to how much you miss Mandy Marie from Albu. Really like how you've indexed your blog in catagories. I love a good index! Good work my lil drey bear.
item.content:encoded: I thought maybe you’d have an entry dedicated to how much you miss Mandy Marie from Albu. Really like how you’ve indexed your blog in catagories. I love a good index! Good work my lil drey bear.

item.title: By: monica
item.dc:creator: monica
item.description:
Can we ask again in a little bit? :)
I suppose that it is what we affirm rather than what we deny that makes us who we are...
And I still think you should finish it...;0 *hugs*
item.content:encoded:
Can we ask again in a little bit? ðŸ™‚

I suppose that it is what we affirm rather than what we deny that makes us who we are…

And I still think you should finish it…;0
